output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens to any user account, causing a integer overflow in the user's balance.
The transferFrom function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a attacker to make the recipient's balance overflow and leading to loss of funds.
The sell function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the contract's balance, allowing a attacker to make the contract's balance overflow and leading to loss of funds.
The buy function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the buyer's balance, allowing a attacker to make the buyer's balance overflow and leading to loss of funds.
The transfer function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the recipient's balance, allowing a attacker to make the recipient's balance overflow and leading to loss of funds.
